I am currently a Research Associate at the  [Hydrology Lab, Technische Hochschule Lübeck](https://uhydro.de/water/) led by Prof. Dr. C. Külls. Concurrently, I am pursuing a Ph.D. in Hydro(geo)logy at TU Darmstadt, with joint supervision from Prof. Dr. C. Schüth and Prof. Dr. C. Külls.

## Research interests

- Groundwater salinization
- Hydrogeochemistry
- Isotope Hydrology 
- Compartment models 

## Experience

-   Research associate (with teaching duties) Laboratory of Hydrology THL | Sep 2022 - Present
-   Research associate in the [MEDSAL project](https://medsal.eu/) Laboratory of Hydrology THL | Oct 2021 - Aug 2022
-   Student researcher at Laboratory of Sedimentology - University of Patras | Mar 2017- Dec 2020
